title: Drawing, "Design for a Punch Bowl", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at uppeer right: 283
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: COUPE A PUNCH/DIAMETRE 26 cms/HAUTEUR 20 cms; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/43; to right of base: [arrow] MADERA [?]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Flaring bowl with three applied bands raised on a semi-circular stem that sits in a trapezoid-shaped base with three applied bands at foot. The base in red ink to be executed in madera (?). Central screw connecting bowl stem and base indicated in graphite. Underdrawing in graphite of cup in golden section.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 283
